faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about BlockRush

questions.a: BlockRush is a crowdfunding platform to purchase Bitcoin miners (Bitmain Antminer S19 XP). Each participant receives shares proportional to their investment and shares the mining rewards discovered.
Bitcoin mining offers no guaranteed returns. Block discovery is random. If the funding goal isn't reached, you get a 100% refund. Rewards depend on luck and Bitcoin network difficulty.

If a Bitcoin block is discovered by our miners, the reward (currently 3.125 BTC + fees) is distributed proportionally among all participants according to their shares. Example: if you have 2% of shares, you receive 2% of the reward.
Before goal is reached: full refund possible. After miners are purchased: your investment is converted into mining shares. Future rewards will be paid to you in Bitcoin.

questions.q: How long does the project last?
questions.a: Funding continues until reaching â‚¬25,000. Once the goal is reached, miners are installed within 14 days and run 24/7 to attempt discovering Bitcoin blocks.
You'll have access to a real-time dashboard showing: computing power, mining attempts, and all transactions. Total transparency guaranteed via blockchain.
